DOC.brief_summary: Comparing short-term efficacy rofecoxib versus placebo . Patients receive rofecoxib placebo diclofenac fill patient diary daytime pain severity daily activity , night pain severity , acetaminophen/paracetamol intake .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Rofecoxib Versus Placebo Diclofenac Patients With Acute Painful Rotator Cuff Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 59 acute painful rotator cuff syndrome .
